hsj:adv_amber_desc: Find the Amber Eye at the heart of a strange forest
hsj:adv_aquatic_desc: Catch the Aquatic Eye while trawling the deep
hsj:adv_archaic_desc: Find the Archaic Eye while rediscovering the past
hsj:adv_beastmasters_desc: Craft the Beastmaster's Eye with the spoils of exotic creatures
hsj:adv_bound_desc: Retrieve the Bound Eye from a mage of the mansion
hsj:adv_curious_desc: Find the Curious Eye in an enemy outpost
hsj:adv_elder_desc: Retrieve the Elder Eye from an ancient guardian
hsj:adv_eldritch_desc: Find the Eldritch Eye in a archaic city deep beneath the surface
hsj:adv_entombed_desc: Find the Entombed Eye in a desert tomb
hsj:adv_forged_desc: Obtain the Forged Eye from a master armorsmith
hsj:adv_golden_desc: Find the Golden Eye in a temple in the jungle
hsj:adv_ominous_desc: Find the Ominous Eye in a chamber's vault
hsj:adv_opulent_desc: Find the Opulent Eye in a buried chest full of treasure
hsj:adv_queens_desc: Find the Queen's Eye within a hive
hsj:adv_spellbound_desc: Uncover the Spellbound Eye while enchanting an item
hsj:adv_withered_desc: Retrieve the Withered Eye from a beast with three heads
hsj:eye_rejected: The portal rejects the eye... More powerful eyes are needed...
